se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.tree.model.path

Class AbstractPath<SegmentType extends Serializable & Comparable<SegmentType>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.model.NazgulEntity
      • se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.tree.model.path.AbstractPath<SegmentType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api.trees.path.Path<SegmentType>>, Iterable<SegmentType>, se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api.trees.path.Path<SegmentType>, se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.Validatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringPath

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class AbstractPath<SegmentType extends Serializable & Comparable<SegmentType>>
extends NazgulEntity
implements se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api.trees.path.Path<SegmentType>
    Non-semantic Path implementation using List as internal storage of KeyType segments. Note! This implementation is immutable, implying that the append method returns a new instance, rather than modifying this one.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR

        public static final String DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR
        The separator between segments of this AbstractPath. This DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR is used in the default toString implementation, as glue between segments.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPath

        public AbstractPath()
        JPA/JAXB-friendly constructor. Note! This constructor is for framework use only.

      • AbstractPath

        public AbstractPath(String compoundPath)
        Convenience constructor, creating a new AbstractPath instance with the supplied compoundPath and using the DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR for separator between segments.
        Parameters:
        compoundPath - The compound path representation of this AbstractPath. Each segment string must be convertible to a SegmentType instance.
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR

      • AbstractPath

        public AbstractPath(String compoundPath,
                    String segmentSeparator)
        Compound constructor, creating a new AbstractPath instance from the supplied data.
        Parameters:
        compoundPath - The compound path representation of this AbstractPath. Each segment string must be convertible to a SegmentType instance.
        segmentSeparator - The string separating SegmentType representations from each other.

    • Method Detail

      • getSegments

        protected abstract List<SegmentType> getSegments()
        Returns:
        The List of SegmentType instances which is this Path.

      • getCompoundPath

        public String getCompoundPath()
        Returns:
        A compound string representation of this AbstractPath used for JPA storage and searches. The compoundPath is represented as the segments, separated by the segmentSeparator string, or the DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR if no explicit segmentSeparator is given.

      • getSegmentSeparator

        public String getSegmentSeparator()
        Returns:
        The segment separator string, or the DEFAULT_SEGMENT_SEPARATOR if no explicit segmentSeparator string is given.
